definition: the act of compensating for service or loss or injury, make payment to
details:
noun
- the act of compensating for service or loss or injury
= synonyms: compensation
- payment or reward (as for service rendered)
verb
- make payment to
= synonyms: compensate, remunerate
- make amends for
= synonyms: repair, atone, compensate, indemnify, expiate, aby, abye
